about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for the Evanescent! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock the Evanescent if you don't already own them! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • The Evanescent (if you don't already own them)
  • Their Soul Cake Golden Epic
  • Their Rare Artfully Dribbled Candle and Rare Jawless Skull gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials
detailed_description:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for the Evanescent! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock the Evanescent if you don't already own them! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • The Evanescent (if you don't already own them)
  • Their Soul Cake Golden Epic
  • Their Rare Artfully Dribbled Candle and Rare Jawless Skull gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor

name: Crusaders of the Lost Idols: The Evanescent's Epic Starter Pack

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
